bug.summary: Update ml5 and p5Utils to support p5Instance Mode
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>→ Description 📝</denchmark-h>
A clear and concise description of what the issue is about. Let us know if you:
found a bug 🐛
We recently discovered that running ml5 in p5 Instance mode can cause some errors. See discussion here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ml5js/ml5-examples/issues/159>ml5js/ml5-examples#159</denchmark-link>
We should make sure to target the if possible for functions we'd like to use e.g. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ml5js/ml5-examples/issues/159#issuecomment-498489796>ml5js/ml5-examples#159 (comment)</denchmark-link>
In the quick test shown in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ml5js/ml5-examples/issues/159>ml5js/ml5-examples#159</denchmark-link> it seems we cause another error so we should be aware of trying to make sure not to propagate errors. <denchmark-h:h2>→ Screenshots 🖼</denchmark-h>
